analyzed: shin tu bde ba rgyas pa yis/_/'dod pa'i don rnams gter mdzad cing /_/

analyzed: dngos su lhan skyes gter mdzad ma/_/nam mkha' mi 'od zla nyi 'dud/_/
translated: I bow to the moon, sun, and fire in the sky.🔽From the ocean of vows taught

analyzed: dpal ldan rab 'bar rnal 'byor mas/_/sdom pa rgya mtshhor gsungs pa las/_/
translated: by the glorious blazing Vajrayoginī,🔽I will teach a brief version

analyzed: mdor bsdus bdag gis bstan par bya/_/mos pa'i don du 'di bsgrub byas/_/

analyzed: nyi ma nyid kyis byin brlabs thob/_/bla ma 'khur zhing bsgrub la brtshon/_/blo

analyzed: ldan ngang brgyud bzang las 'ong /_/de las gzhan las min pa'o/_/dur khrod

analyzed: dam ni shing cig gam/_/ri dgon ljongs sam dben gnas sam/_/lha khang
translated: in a forest, in a solitary place, in a temple,🔽in an empty house, in a haunted place,

analyzed: khang stong 'dre gnas dang /_/nyams dga'i gnas su 'dug byas la/_/bde
translated: in a delightful place, one should sit down and

analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i 'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
translated: The Secret Sādhana of the Glorious Vajrayoginī

analyzed: ba'i stan la 'dug byas ste/_/mi g.yo bsam gtan dkyil dkrungs bca'/
translated: one should sit on a comfortable seat and arrange the maṇḍala of unwavering concentration.

original: sems bskyed sngon du btang nas ni/_/rang nyid skad cig lhar bsams la/_/
analyzed: sems bskyed sngon du btang nas ni/_/rang nyid skad cig lhar bsams la/_/
translated: Having generated bodhicitta beforehand, one should imagine oneself as the deity in an instant.

analyzed: rang gi snying khar pad nyi'i stengs/_/bam las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros/_/
translated: On a lotus and sun in one’s heart, from vaṃ light radiates into the ten directions.

original: sems can thams cad rnal 'byor mar/_/gyur nas 'od zer bam la thim/
analyzed: sems can thams cad rnal 'byor mar/_/gyur nas 'od zer bam la thim/
translated: All sentient beings become Yoginī, and the light dissolves into vaṃ.

original: yang 'phros 'phags mchod 'od gyur nas/_/yang ni bam la thim par bsam/
analyzed: yang 'phros 'phags mchod 'od gyur nas/_/yang ni bam la thim par bsam/
translated: Again, it radiates out, makes offerings to the āryas, and again dissolves into vaṃ.

original: rang lus 'od gsal stong khams khyab/_/rang lus 'od phung yi ge bam/_/gyur
analyzed: rang lus 'od gsal stong khams khyab/_/rang lus 'od phung yi ge bam/_/gyur
translated: My body is clear light, pervading the whole of space, and my body becomes a mass of light, the syllable Bam.

original: nas 'od zer bam la thim/_/yang 'phros 'phags mchod 'od gyur nas/_/yang🔽ni bam la thim par bsam/_/bam de yongs su gyur pa las/_/bdag nyid rdo rje
analyzed: nas 'od zer bam la thim/_/yang 'phros 'phags mchod 'od gyur nas/_/yang ni bam la thim par bsam/_/bam de yongs su gyur pa las/_/bdag nyid rdo rje
translated: Light radiates out and dissolves into the Bam, and again radiates out, makes offerings to the noble ones, and then🔽again dissolves into the Bam.

original: rnal 'byor ma/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar/_/gcer bu spyan🔽gsum dbu skra grol/_/thod skam lnga ni rigs lnga'i brgyan/_/rus pa'i brgyan cha
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar/_/gcer bu spyan gsum dbu skra grol/_/thod skam lnga ni rigs lnga'i brgyan/_/rus pa'i brgyan cha
translated: I think that the Bam completely transforms into myself as Vajrayoginī, with one face, two arms, and a red-colored body,🔽naked, with three eyes, and my hair loose.🔽I am adorned with the five dry skulls of the five buddha families and the five bone ornaments,

original: lnga yis brgyan/_/thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal mnga'/_/phyag g.yas gri gug
analyzed: lnga yis brgyan/_/thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal mnga'/_/phyag g.yas gri gug
translated: and I have a garland of fifty fresh skulls.

original: g.yon thod khrag_/kha :ga dang yang dag gnas/_/dar dpyangs dag gis
analyzed: g.yon thod khrag_/kha :ga dang yang dag gnas/_/dar dpyangs dag gis
translated: My right hand holds a flaying knife, and my left hand holds a skull cup with blood.

original: rab tu mdzes/_/bcu drug lon pa'i na tshhod ltar/_/sku ni shin tu rgyas pa la/_/
analyzed: rab tu mdzes/_/bcu drug lon pa'i na tshhod ltar/_/sku ni shin tu rgyas pa la/_/
translated: I am beautified with silk scarves

original: pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan stengs na/_/g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar tshhul bzhugs/_/
analyzed: pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan stengs na/_/g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar tshhul bzhugs/_/
translated: and stand with my right leg bent and left extended in dancing posture on a seat of lotus and sun disk,🔽my body full and voluptuous like a sixteen-year-old.

original: thugs khar pad+ma nyi ma'i stengs/_/bam las sngags phreng gsal bar bsgom/_/
analyzed: thugs khar pad+ma nyi ma'i stengs/_/bam las sngags phreng gsal bar bsgom/_/
translated: meditate on the mantra garland clearly arising from vaṃ.🔽Then, in the single perfection of the essence of the connate,

original: lhan skyes ngo bo cig rdzogs su/_/mi bskyod bar du gsal bar bsgom/_/de
analyzed: lhan skyes ngo bo cig rdzogs su/_/mi bskyod bar du gsal bar bsgom/_/de
translated: meditate on Akṣobhya clearly.🔽When one becomes weary of that,🔽the meaning of the profound completion stage is

original: nas skyo bar gyur pa na/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa zab mo'i don/_/rang gi lha sku
analyzed: nas skyo bar gyur pa na/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa zab mo'i don/_/rang gi lha sku
translated: that one’s deity’s form🔽is the appearance-emptiness of the deity.

original: snang stong du/_/ye yin bar ni gsal gdab bya/_/de nas 'di ltar bsgom bya
analyzed: snang stong du/_/ye yin bar ni gsal gdab bya/_/de nas 'di ltar bsgom bya
translated: Then meditate in the following way:

original: ste/_/rang gi lte ba'i dbus nyid du/_/chos 'byung gru gsum kha dog dmar/_/
analyzed: ste/_/rang gi lte ba'i dbus nyid du/_/chos 'byung gru gsum kha dog dmar/_/
translated: In the center of one’s navel is a red tetrahedral source of phenomena.🔽In its center, on a four-petaled lotus,

original: de dbus pad 'dab bzhi yi stengs/_/dbus su bam dang yi ge bzhi/_/de yang
analyzed: de dbus pad 'dab bzhi yi stengs/_/dbus su bam dang yi ge bzhi/_/de yang
translated: is vaṃ in the center and the four syllables in the four directions.🔽Think that they rotate counterclockwise.

original: g.yon du 'khor bar bsam/_/rtsha gsum gsal btab dbus mar me/_/rlung
analyzed: g.yon du 'khor bar bsam/_/rtsha gsum gsal btab dbus mar me/_/rlung
translated: After visualizing the three nāḍīs,🔽press down on the vāyu as long as one can.

original: ni thub tshhad mnan par bya/_/steng rlung gi ni don bsgom ni/_/'khor lo
analyzed: ni thub tshhad mnan par bya/_/steng rlung gi ni don bsgom ni/_/'khor lo
translated: The upper vāyu is the meditation on the wheel🔽with a white syllable in the nose.

original: dkar po yig 'brur bcas/_/sna bas brngub cing drag du mnan/_/'og rlung
analyzed: dkar po yig 'brur bcas/_/sna bas brngub cing drag du mnan/_/'og rlung
translated: Inhale through the nostrils and press down strongly.

original: dag la bsgom bslob na/_/pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar a/_/rgyu zhabs bsdams
analyzed: dag la bsgom bslob na/_/pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar a/_/rgyu zhabs bsdams
translated: in the center of a red lotus, there is an A,🔽with the lower door blocked and the lower orifices closed.

original: cing 'og sgo bsdams/_/thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa 'am/_/steng 'og
analyzed: cing 'og sgo bsdams/_/thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa 'am/_/steng 'og
translated: This is the meditation on method and wisdom,🔽or the upper and lower vase breathing.🔽This is also the transference with the skylight.

original: bum pa can zhes bya/_/'pho ba dkar khung can yang yin/_/drod skye 'dod na
analyzed: bum pa can zhes bya/_/'pho ba dkar khung can yang yin/_/drod skye 'dod na
translated: If you wish to generate heat,🔽meditate on bliss in the fire and wind.🔽If you wish to meditate on the four chakras,

original: me rlung la/_/bde ba bsgom na 'khor lo bzhi/_/'od gsal snying kha'i hum las
analyzed: me rlung la/_/bde ba bsgom na 'khor lo bzhi/_/'od gsal snying kha'i hum las
translated: the light of luminosity arises from the hum in the heart.🔽Meditate on all the elements being burned.

original: me/_/'byung ba thams cad bsreg cing bsgom/_/skabs su dran dang 'dun
analyzed: me/_/'byung ba thams cad bsreg cing bsgom/_/skabs su dran dang 'dun
translated: From time to time, with mindfulness and interest,🔽meditate on everything as a dream.🔽If you wish to mix with sleep, the hum in the heart

original: pa yis/_/rmi lam lta bur thams cad bsgom/_/gnyid dang bsre na snying khar hum//
analyzed: pa yis/_/rmi lam lta bur thams cad bsgom/_/gnyid dang bsre na snying khar hum//
translated: is the dream-state. If you wish to hold the dream,🔽project it in front of you. If you wish to mix,🔽pacify the aggregates.🔽If you wish to meditate on illusory body,

original: rmi lam 'dzin na mdun pa btang /_/sbyor na phung po zhi gros bya/_/lha sku sgyu ma
analyzed: rmi lam 'dzin na mdun pa btang /_/sbyor na phung po zhi gros bya/_/lha sku sgyu ma
translated: meditate on the deity’s form as an illusion,🔽or on the entire billion-world universe

original: lta bu 'am/_/keng rus ri 'am me nyid du/_/stong khams thams cad gsal
analyzed: lta bu 'am/_/keng rus ri 'am me nyid du/_/stong khams thams cad gsal
translated: as a mountain of skeletons or fire.🔽Abandon all fear and doubt.

original: bar bsreg_/ya nga bag tshha ma lus spangs/_/da lta sgyu lus 'od gsal bsgom/
analyzed: bar bsreg_/ya nga bag tshha ma lus spangs/_/da lta sgyu lus 'od gsal bsgom/
translated: Now meditate on illusory body and luminosity.

original: 'chi khar 'pho ba'i 'jug pas 'phang /_/yang na phyag rgya chen don bzhag_/
analyzed: 'chi khar 'pho ba'i 'jug pas 'phang /_/yang na phyag rgya chen don bzhag_/
translated: or you will be left in the state of mahamudra.

original: de ltar bsgom pas rtags rnams 'byung /_/de la brten ste lus drod skye/
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pas rtags rnams 'byung /_/de la brten ste lus drod skye/
translated: Through such meditation, signs will arise, and on the basis of those, heat will arise in the body.

original: drod la brten ste bde ba skye/_/bde ba la brten rtog pa 'gag_/mi rtogs
analyzed: drod la brten ste bde ba skye/_/bde ba la brten rtog pa 'gag_/mi rtogs
translated: On the basis of heat, bliss will arise, and on the basis of bliss, thoughts will cease.

original: pa'ang shugs la 'ong /_/rtog med ngang la gnas par bya/_/de nas blo ni sun
analyzed: pa'ang shugs la 'ong /_/rtog med ngang la gnas par bya/_/de nas blo ni sun
translated: Nonconceptuality will also come about by implication, and you should rest in that state of nonconceptuality.🔽Then, do not be discouraged if your mind is not trained.🔽If experience has not arisen, then perform the action of the mudra,

original: mi dbyung /_/nyams ma skyes na las phyag rgya/_/'du shes gsum ldan bzhin
analyzed: mi dbyung /_/nyams ma skyes na las phyag rgya/_/'du shes gsum ldan bzhin
translated: and with the three perceptions,🔽take a young maiden of sixteen or twenty years of age,

original: bzangs ma/_/bcu drug nyi shu cig man chad/_/rang dbang bskur zhing blo
analyzed: bzangs ma/_/bcu drug nyi shu cig man chad/_/rang dbang bskur zhing blo
translated: give her empowerment, and train her mind.🔽Generate her as a deity, hold the haṃ and aṃ, and hold the bindu.

original: sbyangs la/_/lhar bskyed ham am thig le gzung /_/mig bzlog hum bgrang mthe
analyzed: sbyangs la/_/lhar bskyed ham am thig le gzung /_/mig bzlog hum bgrang mthe
translated: Reverse the eyes, count “hum,” and contract the thumbs.🔽Bliss will arise from that.

original: bong skum/_/de la bde ba skye bar 'gyur/_/dpe yi don la blo yang sbyangs/_/
analyzed: bong skum/_/de la bde ba skye bar 'gyur/_/dpe yi don la blo yang sbyangs/_/
translated: Also train the mind in the meaning of the example.🔽Think that everything is blissful in the end.

original: gzhug du thams cad bde bar bsam/_/des ni mchog gi sid+hi thob/_/de
analyzed: gzhug du thams cad bde bar bsam/_/des ni mchog gi sid+hi thob/_/de
translated: Through that, you will obtain the supreme siddhi.

original: rnams rdzogs rims bsgom pa'o/_/yang na bzlas pa bsgrub pa ni/_/blo 'bring
analyzed: rnams rdzogs rims bsgom pa'o/_/yang na bzlas pa bsgrub pa ni/_/blo 'bring
translated: The short version is the recitation of compassion.

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: The recitation of the mantra is as follows:🔽In one’s heart, upon a lotus and sun,

original: snying rje'i bzlas pa ni/_/rang gi snying khar pad nyi'i stengs/_/bam las sngags
analyzed: snying rje'i bzlas pa ni/_/rang gi snying khar pad nyi'i stengs/_/bam las sngags
translated: is a baṃ, surrounded by the mantra.🔽Also, imagine that it is turning to the left.🔽The mantra and the syllable baṃ are red.

original: kyis bskor bar bsam/_/de yang g.yon du 'khor bar bsam/_/sngags dang yi ge bam ni dmar/_/'dab bzhi'i yi ge 'bru bzhi ni/_/sngo sogs kha dog
analyzed: kyis bskor bar bsam/_/de yang g.yon du 'khor bar bsam/_/sngags dang yi ge bam ni dmar/_/'dab bzhi'i yi ge 'bru bzhi ni/_/sngo sogs kha dog
translated: The four syllables on the four petals are the four colors,

original: rnam bzhi po/_/de las 'od 'phros sbyangs gzhi byas/_/'phags mchod mchog
analyzed: rnam bzhi po/_/de las 'od 'phros sbyangs gzhi byas/_/'phags mchod mchog
translated: blue and so forth. Light radiates from those, purifying the basis of purification.🔽The supreme siddhi is the offering to the āryas.🔽Also meditate on the common siddhis.

original: gi sid+hi blangs/_/thun mong dag kyang grub par bsgom/_/om badzra bai ro tsha ni ye
analyzed: gi sid+hi blangs/_/thun mong dag kyang grub par bsgom/_/om badzra bai ro tsha ni ye
translated: Om vajra vairocana ye🔽hari ni sa hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Recite this one hundred thousand times.

original: ha ri ni sa hum phat/_zhes pa 'bum tshho bcu gsum bskyal/_/om hrih_hu~m swa ha/
analyzed: ha ri ni sa hum phat/_zhes pa 'bum tshho bcu gsum bskyal/_/om hrih_hu~m swa ha/
translated: Om hrīḥ hūṃ svāhā.🔽Recite this fifty thousand times.

original: zhes pa khri tshho lnga bcu bskyal/_/smra ba bcad nas bzlas na yin/_/gzhan du
analyzed: zhes pa khri tshho lnga bcu bskyal/_/smra ba bcad nas bzlas na yin/_/gzhan du
translated: If one recites this while observing silence,🔽it is the recitation of compassion.

original: brtshams par mi bya'o/_/de ltar bstan par gyur na ni/_/de nas skal ldan
analyzed: brtshams par mi bya'o/_/de ltar bstan par gyur na ni/_/de nas skal ldan
translated: one should be accepted.🔽Having seen the number and signs,🔽recite the Hari Ni

original: bzung bya ste/_/grangs dang mtshhan ma mthong gyur pas/_/zhag bdun ha ri ni
analyzed: bzung bya ste/_/grangs dang mtshhan ma mthong gyur pas/_/zhag bdun ha ri ni
translated: for seven days.🔽In a delightful place, sprinkle water,

original: sa bzlas/_/gnas khang nyams dgar chag chag gdab/_/dal ni chu dang chang
analyzed: sa bzlas/_/gnas khang nyams dgar chag chag gdab/_/dal ni chu dang chang
translated: and anoint the maṇḍala with water and beer.🔽In the palace of the source of phenomena, the ḍākinīs

original: gis byug_/chos 'byung pho brang mkha' 'gro yis/_/sa bon lnga ni legs bris la/_/
analyzed: gis byug_/chos 'byung pho brang mkha' 'gro yis/_/sa bon lnga ni legs bris la/_/
translated: should draw the five seed syllables well.🔽Put sindūra in a good, new cloth.

original: sin d+hu ra bzang dar la btshag_/dam tshhig ldan pa'i bdud rtshi dang /_/bum
analyzed: sin d+hu ra bzang dar la btshag_/dam tshhig ldan pa'i bdud rtshi dang /_/bum
translated: The pledge substances, the vase with the characteristics,🔽and all the articles should be arranged.

original: pa mtshhan ldan bkra shis legs/_/yo byad thams cad tshhang ba dang /_/mchod
analyzed: pa mtshhan ldan bkra shis legs/_/yo byad thams cad tshhang ba dang /_/mchod
translated: Having made various offerings,

original: pa sna tshhogs byas nas ni/_/slob ma yang dag gzung bar bya/_/rnal 'byor
analyzed: pa sna tshhogs byas nas ni/_/slob ma yang dag gzung bar bya/_/rnal 'byor
translated: the disciple should be accepted.🔽The yoga of the good time is the offering;

original: dus bzang mchod pa ni/_/nyams dgu'i gnas su dkyil 'khor bri/_/mkha'
analyzed: dus bzang mchod pa ni/_/nyams dgu'i gnas su dkyil 'khor bri/_/mkha'
translated: the maṇḍala is drawn in a delightful place.🔽The five ḍākinīs are offered with the five offerings.

original: 'gro lnga ni mchod lngas mchod/_/dbang du bsdud pa'i cho ga ni/_/lhar bsam
analyzed: 'gro lnga ni mchod lngas mchod/_/dbang du bsdud pa'i cho ga ni/_/lhar bsam
translated: The rite of summoning is visualizing the deity🔽and the mudra.

original: thugs khar bam dang ni/_/yi ge bzhi ni bsam 'od spros/_/rtsha ba'i sngags la
analyzed: thugs khar bam dang ni/_/yi ge bzhi ni bsam 'od spros/_/rtsha ba'i sngags la
translated: Recite this mantra:

original: 'di bzlas bya/_/che ge mo badzra b+ha rang+ki a be sha ya a a/_zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: 'di bzlas bya/_/che ge mo badzra b+ha rang+ki a be sha ya a a/_zhes brjod cing /
translated: “Om vajra bharanki avasaya a a.”🔽From the two syllables “ram” and “lam,” the curved knife is emanated.

original: rang dal gnyis las gri gug spro/_/bsgrub bya bkug nas dbang du bsam/_/
analyzed: rang dal gnyis las gri gug spro/_/bsgrub bya bkug nas dbang du bsam/_/
translated: Having summoned the object of the rite, imagine that he is brought under control.

original: tshhogs gtor dag kyang bya ba'o/_/rang gzhan bar chad gsal ba ni/_/'thun
analyzed: tshhogs gtor dag kyang bya ba'o/_/rang gzhan bar chad gsal ba ni/_/'thun
translated: Also, perform the feast and torma offerings.🔽In a suitable place, draw the mandala.

original: pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor bri/_/bla ma rad na pu tsha bya/_/tshhogs dang gtor
analyzed: pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor bri/_/bla ma rad na pu tsha bya/_/tshhogs dang gtor
translated: Make offerings to the guru, the precious one, and also offer the feast and torma.

original: ma kun kyang btang /_/bdag nyid lhar bsgom 'khor lo tha mi dad/_/nad🔽pa'i snying khar song nas ni/_/pad ma'i 'khor lo 'khor lo 'khor/_/nad
analyzed: ma kun kyang btang /_/bdag nyid lhar bsgom 'khor lo tha mi dad/_/nad pa'i snying khar song nas ni/_/pad ma'i 'khor lo 'khor lo 'khor/_/nad
translated: Meditate on yourself as the deity, inseparable from the wheel.🔽Having gone to the heart of the patient,🔽the lotus wheel spins and spins.🔽Imagine that the illness and the spirit are reduced to dust

original: gdon rdul phran tsham du yang /_/mi gnas 'khor los brtags par bsam/_/
analyzed: gdon rdul phran tsham du yang /_/mi gnas 'khor los brtags par bsam/_/
translated: and that they are destroyed by the wheel.🔽Both oneself and the other should meditate in this way.

original: rang gzhan gnyis kas de ltar bsgom/_/sngags ni gong la 'di rtag bzlas/
analyzed: rang gzhan gnyis kas de ltar bsgom/_/sngags ni gong la 'di rtag bzlas/
translated: Always recite this mantra above:

original: sarba dza ram ni tra swa ha/_zhes pa mang pos bar du bzlas/_/gzhan yang rnal
analyzed: sarba dza ram ni tra swa ha/_zhes pa mang pos bar du bzlas/_/gzhan yang rnal
translated: Sarva-jvara-antardhana svaha.

original: 'byor 'phrin las ni/_/bsgrub par 'dod na sbyin bsreg bya/_/zhi ba zlum po
analyzed: 'byor 'phrin las ni/_/bsgrub par 'dod na sbyin bsreg bya/_/zhi ba zlum po
translated: If you wish to accomplish the activities of yoga, you should perform burnt offerings.🔽For pacification, the fire pit is round, white,🔽with soft, fragrant wood, smoke,🔽clarified butter, cakes, yogurt,

original: kha dog dkar/_/shing 'jam dri zhim dud pa dang /_/mar dang khur ba zho dang ni/_/'o ma me tog bsreg rdzas yin/_/til dkar sman kyang ba lus bsreg_/
analyzed: kha dog dkar/_/shing 'jam dri zhim dud pa dang /_/mar dang khur ba zho dang ni/_/'o ma me tog bsreg rdzas yin/_/til dkar sman kyang ba lus bsreg_/
translated: milk, and flowers as the burnt substances.

original: kha ni shar bltas me yang ni/_/dge 'dun gnas nas snga dro spar/_/zhi ba shan+tim
analyzed: kha ni shar bltas me yang ni/_/dge 'dun gnas nas snga dro spar/_/zhi ba shan+tim
translated: Facing east, the fire is lit in the morning from the Sangha's place.🔽For pacification, Shantimkuruye svaha.🔽Offerings and tsok should be done for all.🔽For increase, the fire pit is in the north, yellow,

original: ku ru ye swa ha/_lan grangs nyi shu rtsha gcig dbul/_/kun la mchod dang gtor tshhogs bya/_/rgyas pa byang la kha dog ser/_/shing ni ser po 'bras bu
analyzed: ku ru ye swa ha/_lan grangs nyi shu rtsha gcig dbul/_/kun la mchod dang gtor tshhogs bya/_/rgyas pa byang la kha dog ser/_/shing ni ser po 'bras bu
translated: with yellow wood and fruit,🔽square in shape, the fire of kings,🔽cakes, clarified butter, rice,🔽and yellow flowers, etc., as the burnt substances.

original: can/_/dbyibs ni gru bzhi rgyal po me/_/khur ba mar khu 'bras chan dang /_/ me tog ser po la sogs bsreg_/tshhe dang bsod nams rgyas par bsgom/_/
analyzed: can/_/dbyibs ni gru bzhi rgyal po me/_/khur ba mar khu 'bras chan dang /_/ me tog ser po la sogs bsreg_/tshhe dang bsod nams rgyas par bsgom/_/
translated: Contemplate the increase of lifespan and merit.

original: sarba / ku ru ye swa ha/_lan ni nyi shu rtsha gcig dbul/_/dbang la zla gam
analyzed: sarba / ku ru ye swa ha/_lan ni nyi shu rtsha gcig dbul/_/dbang la zla gam
translated: Offer twenty-one times.🔽For power, make a red half-moon,

original: dmar por bya/_/shing ni dmar po 'o ma can/_/mar khu khur ba chang dang yang /_/
analyzed: dmar por bya/_/shing ni dmar po 'o ma can/_/mar khu khur ba chang dang yang /_/
translated: A red tree with milk, ghee, and beer,🔽 And red flowers.🔽Face west.

original: me tog dmar po dang ldan no/_/kha ni nub du bltas pa'o/_/'od zer dmar🔽po gri gug dbyibs/_/spros pas bsgrub bya'i snying nas bzung /_/dbang du
analyzed: me tog dmar po dang ldan no/_/kha ni nub du bltas pa'o/_/'od zer dmar po gri gug dbyibs/_/spros pas bsgrub bya'i snying nas bzung /_/dbang du
translated: Red light rays in the shape of a flaying knife🔽Emanate and take the victim's heart.🔽 Imagine that they are brought under control.

original: 'dus par bsam bzhin du/_/che ge badzra wa ra hi a be sha ya a ah/_lan ni
analyzed: 'dus par bsam bzhin du/_/che ge badzra wa ra hi a be sha ya a ah/_lan ni
translated: So-and-so vajra varahi avaśa-aya a a ha.🔽Offer twenty-one times.🔽For fierce action, a black triangle in the south,

original: nyi shu rtsha gcig dbul/_/drag po nag po gru gsum lho/_/shing ni nag po tshher ma
analyzed: nyi shu rtsha gcig dbul/_/drag po nag po gru gsum lho/_/shing ni nag po tshher ma
translated: A black tree with thorns,🔽 black grain, human flesh, and a skull,🔽And black flowers.🔽Black light rays in the shape of a flaying knife

original: can/_/mar khu 'bru nag sha chen dang /_/ling kha me tog nag po dang / 'od zer gri gug nag po yis/_/bsgrub bya bkug nas ling kha la/_/bstim
analyzed: can/_/mar khu 'bru nag sha chen dang /_/ling kha me tog nag po dang / 'od zer gri gug nag po yis/_/bsgrub bya bkug nas ling kha la/_/bstim
translated: Emanate and summon the victim,🔽 dissolving them into the skull.🔽The Secret Sādhana of Śrī Vajrayoginī

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: The Secret Sādhana of Śrī Vajrayoginī🔽

original: nas lha mo'i zhal du dbul/_/bsgrub bya'i sdig dag tshhar bcad nas/_/che ge
analyzed: nas lha mo'i zhal du dbul/_/bsgrub bya'i sdig dag tshhar bcad nas/_/che ge
translated: Having purified the negativities and obscurations of the one for whom you do this practice, recite:🔽“Om, such and such a person, mara ya, hum phat.”🔽Offer it for twenty-one days. Praise and confess all [sins] to everyone.

original: mo ma ra ya hu~m phat/_nyi shu rtsha gcig gis dbul lo/_/kun la bstod dang bshags pa bya/_/yi ge brgya bzlas gshegs par bsam/_/thal ba chu klung ri
analyzed: mo ma ra ya hu~m phat/_nyi shu rtsha gcig gis dbul lo/_/kun la bstod dang bshags pa bya/_/yi ge brgya bzlas gshegs par bsam/_/thal ba chu klung ri
translated: Think that [the deities] have departed by reciting the one hundred syllable [mantra].🔽Throw the ashes into a river or a spring.

original: 'am klung /_/dag la gtor bar bya ba yin/_/kun la dgongs dang thun
analyzed: 'am klung /_/dag la gtor bar bya ba yin/_/kun la dgongs dang thun
translated: Offer torma to everyone with the thought of the session break.

original: 'tshhams kyis/_/gtor ma 'di ltar sbyin par byas/_/lha yi bskyed rims ldan
analyzed: 'tshhams kyis/_/gtor ma 'di ltar sbyin par byas/_/lha yi bskyed rims ldan
translated: Those who possess the generation stage of the deity🔽should recite the pure mantra and from emptiness,

original: pa yis/_/dag pa'i sngags brjod stong pa las/_/yam las rlung ram las me kam las mi
analyzed: pa yis/_/dag pa'i sngags brjod stong pa las/_/yam las rlung ram las me kam las mi
translated: from yam comes wind, from ram comes fire, from kam comes the human-head hearth,🔽and from a comes a great skull cup.

original: mgo skam po mgo gsum gyi skyid pu mo/_/a las ka pa la chen po'i chen nang /_/sha lnga
analyzed: mgo skam po mgo gsum gyi skyid pu mo/_/a las ka pa la chen po'i chen nang /_/sha lnga
translated: Inside of that, think of the five meats🔽and the five nectars.🔽Think of the moon from a and the sun from ram.

original: bdud rtshi lnga bsam la/_/a las zla ba ram las nyi/_/om ahhum/_bsams la
analyzed: bdud rtshi lnga bsam la/_/a las zla ba ram las nyi/_/om ahhum/_bsams la
translated: Om, ah, hum.🔽Do as instructed.🔽All sentient beings, all migrating beings,

original: man ngag bzhin bya/_'gro rnams sems can thams cad kyang /_/lhar gyur
analyzed: man ngag bzhin bya/_'gro rnams sems can thams cad kyang /_/lhar gyur
translated: become deities.

original: mdun bsams gtor ma dbul/_/bstod dang gtor ma gsol ba gdab/_/
analyzed: mdun bsams gtor ma dbul/_/bstod dang gtor ma gsol ba gdab/_/
translated: Offer the torma in front, praise, and supplicate for the torma.🔽Since obstacles are removed and siddhis are accomplished,

original: bar chad sel cing sid+hi 'grub/_/des na gtor ma dag la 'bad/_/thun bzhi
analyzed: bar chad sel cing sid+hi 'grub/_/des na gtor ma dag la 'bad/_/thun bzhi
translated: strive in the torma in all sessions, four and so forth.🔽Meditate on the deity’s form, appearance-emptiness,

analyzed: la sogs thams cad du/_/lha sku snang stong dag la bsgom/_/spyod lam bzhi po
translated: in all four activities,🔽such as eating, and so forth.🔽In all four activities,

original: thams cad la/_/zas sogs mchod pa bya ba dang /_/lus lha'i dkyil 'khor
analyzed: thams cad la/_/zas sogs mchod pa bya ba dang /_/lus lha'i dkyil 'khor
translated: such as eating, and so forth,🔽remember the three, the deity’s form, the mandala, and so forth.

original: gsum po la sogs pa dran par bya/_ngag rdo rje'i glu dang gar yang bya/_/lha sku sgyu ma
analyzed: gsum po la sogs pa dran par bya/_ngag rdo rje'i glu dang gar yang bya/_/lha sku sgyu ma
translated: Also, sing vajra songs and perform dances.🔽In the deity’s form, which is like an illusion,🔽either stay or also perform activities.

original: lta bu la/_/gnas sam yang na spyod pa dag_/kyang bya yang na lta ba blo 'das
analyzed: lta bu la/_/gnas sam yang na spyod pa dag_/kyang bya yang na lta ba blo 'das
translated: Or meditate on the view, the transcendence of the intellect.🔽In the end, please the guru with offerings.

original: bsgom/_/tha ma bla ma nor brten mnyes/_/gang yang med na thar lam bstor//
analyzed: bsgom/_/tha ma bla ma nor brten mnyes/_/gang yang med na thar lam bstor//
translated: If you have nothing, then set out on the path of liberation.🔽By this, through stainless virtue,

analyzed: 'di byas dri med dge ba yis/_/nam mkha' mtha' klas 'gro ba rnams/_/
translated: may all migrators throughout the reaches of space🔽become happy and ultimately attain

analyzed: bder gyur mthar thug bla med kyi/_/mchog gi dngos grub thob par shog_/

analyzed: tu rnyed nas ni/_/bla ma te lo pa'i thugs la byon pa/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang
translated: It came to the mind of Guru Tilopa,

analyzed: phyug mkhas pa na ro pa chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//_/ngo//_dang _/_to ra na

analyzed: pa legs par sbyor dang dag pa de//kho ba da na mi/_sa skya pa da lo tor/ ngad gto
